p: Annona muricata ( A. Muricata), Annonaceae family, is a medicinal plant used in the treatment of many diseases ( Moghadamtousi et al., 2015). It has been documented that the extract of A. muricata exhibited anti-microbial activity against A. castellanii ( Moghadamtousi et al., 2015). Combretum trifoliatum ( C. trifoliatum) belongs to Combretaceae family and it is a source of phytochemicals that has been usually used to treat several diseases ( de Morais Lima et al., 2012). Anti-bacterial activity and synergistic effects of plants in the genus Combretum spp. in combination with antibiotic against bacteria have been reported ( de Morais Lima et al., 2012).
